summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2296, for the improvement of Klickitat Avenue, from Spokane Avenue to 16th Avenue Southwest; and 16th Avenue Southwest, from Klickitat Avenue to Railroad Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway 18 feet in width, with a 4 foot walk on the west side of 16th Avenue Southwest; and the southeasterly side of Klickitat Avenue, under Ordinance No. 23695 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
